original_text: He built altars in the Lord's temple. The Lord had said about his temple, ‘That is my home in Jerusalem where people will worship me.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 전에 이르시기를 내가 내 이름을 예루살렘에 두리라 하신 여호와의 성전에 제단들을 쌓고

sentences.original_text: He built altars in the Lord's temple
The Lord had said about his temple
That is my home in Jerusalem
